title: Pretty Little Liars star Shay Mitchell welcomes first child after tragic miscarriage

Pretty Little Liars star Shay Mitchell has welcomed her first child after suffering a tragic miscarriage.

The stunning actress, who also starred in Netflix's You, celebrated the birth of her little girl with boyfriend Matte Babel.

The 32-year-old took to Instagram to announce her daughter had been born.

Shay posted an adorable picture of herself holding her baby's tiny hand in hers.

She captioned it: "Never letting go..."

Her close friend, celebrity trainer Nichelle Hines, commented: "Ahhhhhh! My perfect niece!!!"

And friend Nia Peeples said: "I dreamed about you giving birth last night... welcome to motherhood and the deepest of all feelings"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Most beautiful babe and mother," her PLL co-star Troian Bellisario said.

The announcement comes just a few days after Shay showed off her little girl's wardrobe, filled with adorable tiny outfits and shoes.

She joked: "Replacing my crop tops with even smaller tops these days"

(Image: Getty Images for Republic Record)

Shay, who rose to fame playing Emily Fields in the tense drama series, previously opened up about her traumatic first pregnancy.

She revealed her miscarriage was the reason she'd chosen to wait until she was six months pregnant to share her news with the world.

Speaking in a YouTube Originals series called Almost Ready, she said: "The first time that I was pregnant last year, Matte and I hadn't been planning. It happened and we were really excited about it.

(Image: Shay Mitchell/Instagram)

"I was like 14 weeks, at that point, I had no idea the percentage of miscarriages. When it happened I was just, completely blindsided by it.

"I still have those photos on my phone, and I still have all the doctor visits."

Breaking down in tears, she added: "And it's weird because I haven't looked at them, obviously. But it's not like I forgot about that happening. So of course I'm super happy but I still feel for that one that I lost."
description: The actress, who also starred in Netflix's You, has welcomed her first baby with boyfriend Matte Babel
